sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button @click="geolocate">Get Location</button>
  <GMapMap
      :center="center"
      :zoom="15"
      map-type-id="terrain"
      style="width: 100%; height: 300px" 
  >
    <GMapMarker
        :key="marker.id"
        v-for="marker in markers"
        :position="marker.position"
    />
  </GMapMap>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'App',
  data() {
    return {
      center: {lat: 43.65, lng: -79.38},
      currentPlace: null,
      markers: [],
      places: [],
    }
  },
  methods: {
  geolocate: function() {
    navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(position => {  
      const current = {
        lat: position.coords.latitude, lng: position.coords.longitude,
      }
      this.markers.push({position:{current}})
      this.center = current
    });
  },
},
}
</script>
